EmailTemplate.name: 04_30_2014 EMC vHaiku.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Your VMT-Shirt at EMC World | May 5-8, 2014 | #vHaiku
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EMC WORLD - Las Vegas 2014 <http://bit.ly/1m0UZkh> #vHaiku
EMC World soon. VMTurbo will be there. Giving out t-shirts.
<http://bit.ly/1hHMdrK> May 5-8, 2014 | Booth #830 | The Venetian {{lead.first name:default=Winner Winner Chicken Dinner}}!
Next week, what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas*. We're going to make it Rain, Man. The don't call it "The City of Angels" for nothing. Or something like that.
EMC World is arguably our industry's largest event, and this year, VMTurbo will be on premise in the New Innovators block. We'll be unveiling several exciting new features and compatibilities of VMTurbo Operations Manager, so stop by Booth 830, catch a demo, and snag your very own Limited Edition VMT-Shirt.
See you in Vegas.
*VMT-Shirt recipients will not, strictly speaking, be required to leave their VMT-Shirt in Vegas. See the T-Shirt <bit.ly/1hHMdrK> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
